title: Most important export partner countries for Brazil in 2017
summary: In 2017 , China was the leading producer of Most oranges in the Brazil ( EU28 ) , with over 21.8 % export of Most oranges produced .
The Spanish export was more than two times the export of United_States , the second largest producer of oranges .
The other three producers in the EU produced less than one percent export during this year .
gold: This statistic shows the most important export partner countries for Brazil in 2017 . In 20167 the main export partner country of Brazil was China with a share of 21.8 percent in exports .
